description: 1 BR conveniently located in UES, 1 block from the subway and bus stops, 5 minute walk to Central Park, Madison Avenue, and great restaurant options. You’ll love the apartment's coziness, location and privacy. My place is good for couples and families (including kids).
name: Perfectly located 1 BR in Upper East Side
review: Great apartment in a suberb location.  Overal it is quite small, however for two people who want to see the city it is perfect. Located in a nice area, on a quiet street and very close to the subway. Alex was a great host and, although we never got to meet him as he was away, he was always present online to answer any questions we had and give suggestions. Recommended.
